fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks
eu_initiatives: The primary focus of our EU office is the identification of European politicians and/or political actors who support international democracy assistance with a focus on political party development and the exploration of potential partnerships with these actors.
organisation_name: National Democratic Institute for International Affairs (NDI)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: NDI works on five continents with political parties, governments, parliaments and civic groups to establish and strengthen democratic institutions and practices. The Institute uses a multinational approach that reinforces the message that while there is no single democratic model, certain core principles are shared by all democracies. That philosophy has been applied in more than 130 countries since NDI’s founding in 1983.
